title: @Riot, Why is honor level on a timer?
body:
I just noticed a the honor level flairs appeared in-game immediately after I got honor level 3 I after hadn't played in a few days. This makes me think there is some kind of timer on honor level or that or everyone who got it has almost exactly the same honor per game rate. I'm inclined to believe the former.

Is there a reason for this?

replies.body: There is most certainly SOMETHING going on.  Same thing happened the first time around (last year).  A large group of people all got H3, then H4, then H5 the same day.  Riot, please don't insult our intelligences.
There's a riot post.[ Right there](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/FdtzFV6B-riot-why-is-honor-level-on-a-timer?comment=0000). You know where the reply button is.

I just started LoL end of July during season 7, it took 43 days to get to honor 5.

Took that almost that long to get to honor 3 this season from 2.3.

There is no timer. This is from the FAQ located here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148-Honor-FAQ


> LOADING SCREEN FLAIRS
How do I get a loading screen flair?

> First, hit level 3. Then earn honor from two premade teammates or one stranger in one game. The flair will unlock for your next matchmade game.

> My flair disappeared after one game, why?

> They’re meant to show off that you’re coming off a great game, so they only last one game. Once you're level 3 or better, get an Honor from two premade teammates or one stranger to unlock flair in your next game.

> Is there a cooldown on loading screen flairs?

> Nope. If you keep earning honors, you'll keep your flair across each game you rock the Rift and earn honors.

> Will I get a different loading screen flair per category?

> Not today, but that's a damn good idea.

> Do they get bigger like Champ Mastery?

> They do! At level 4 and 5 the flairs grow.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FdtzFV6B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-07T00:50:21.165+0000)
>
> There is no timer. This is from the FAQ located here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148-Honor-FAQ
> How do I get a loading screen flair?

The confusion I have is why everybody hits honor 3/a checkpoint at the same time.

It seems like since honor was introduced, anytime the first person his an honor level, everybody suddenly hits that level the same day, the day after, or a week the latest. They can even go to sleep, not play anything all night, wake up, and boom, honor level without doing anything.

Happens with 3, 4, and 5.. and it seems like if you're behind your rate of honor gain increases to catch up with the rest of the crowd (I hit honor level 5 last season the same time as everybody else.. but my friend who never plays league when from honor 2 to 5 the same month on 3 games per week.)

Well, it has to refresh. Honor rewards aren't an immediate effect. The server checks and updates honor periodically. Which means, yes, some people would hit it at the same time. 

An example, someone hit honor 3 already, I am still at 2 checkpoint 3.

Know it's a little old but could you give your ideas on this thread. 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/2wsJUjrI-my-team-opened-at-3-minutes-and-i-tried-defending-the-base-1v5-i-got-banned-for-int-feeding

friend of mine started playing again 2 days before honor levels were reset. he reached honor lv 4 in those 2 days.
something is obviously fishy with the honor system.
new season honor levels up slower, last season honor was only in play for half the season so it had to level faster or people would never max honor.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FdtzFV6B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-07T00:50:21.165+0000)
>
> There is no timer. This is from the FAQ located here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148-Honor-FAQ
> How do I get a loading screen flair?

also notice the groups i play with get them almost simultaneously, which doesnt make much sense.
Cool thanks. Guess I just wasn't paying attention to other peoples loading flairs.

My guess is there is a hidden honor soft-cap per day/ week.

This has multiple benefits such as:

Discouraging players from attempting to hard grind through honor levels. 

Ensuring players who gain levels have proved themselves non-toxic over an appropriate period of time

Adding severity to all punishment levels, since it will take that much longer to regain lost honor levels
